statement.title: Content
Standard Input
statement.content:
The first line of the input contains an integer $N$ ($1\leq N\leq 10^5$), indicating the number of the elements in array.

The next lines contain $N$ integers $a_i$ ($1\leq a_i\leq 100$), 
indicating the element in the array.

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content: Output `Yes` if Captain Chen's algorithm works perfectly on the array, otherwise output `No`.

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
4 1 2 3 4Yes
4 4 3 2 1No
